metadata.title: CVE-2020-26541 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Linux kernel through 5.8.13 does not properly enforce the Secure BootForbidden Signature Database (aka dbx) protection mechanism. This affectscerts/blacklist.c and certs/system_keyring.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
